data.actual_result: it tries to resend the message, so you get the error again
data.expected_result: when you get the error and press enter, it closes the message
data.short_description: When you are editing a message and get the "too long" error, pressing Enter attempts to resend the message instead of closing the warning
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Edit it so it's too long - Get the too long error - press enter multiple times
